section.title: Paragraphs with inline markup
section.para: Paragraphs are separated by blank lines and are left-aligned.
Paragraphs are separated by blank lines and are left-aligned.
Paragraphs contain text and may contain inline markup: emphasis, strong emphasis, or both stacked.
Spaces *should not* be introduced by markup.
